reviewText: This is an old vhs tape, but don't let that fool you.  A fifteen minute workout following these simple routines will have your waist and belly in shape in a few weeks.  This is for women definitely, but I can also see some couch potato men that would enjoy and benefit also.  I have had this for years, and just purchased another copy for backup, just in case!  And, no need to buy new clothes for the coming season, my body looks great in the old ones.  Banish your belly is a "must" to purchase and follow.
